SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Provide a Localized Admin Experience

For admin users whose Language setting isn't English, B2B Commerce for Visualforce now provides a localized experience in Salesforce. CC Admin labels, menus, and configuration settings are now translatable. Outside of CC Admin, B2B Commerce for Visualforce managed package information, including its custom objects and fields, are also translatable. By default, B2B Commerce for Visualforce provides Japanese translations, but you can add your own languages.

Where: This change applies to B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (version 4.10) in Lightning Experience and Salesforce Classic in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.

How: For users whose Language setting is Japanese, the translatable items display in Japanese automatically.

For other languages you want to support, use Translation Workbench to provide your own translations.

DID THIS ARTICLE SOLVE YOUR ISSUE?
Let us know so we can improve!

title: Localized Admin Experience for B2B Commerce
